title: Make Sweet
sinopse:
Bittersweet stories that make your heart race in a painful but happy way. A compilation of stories about one-sided love that will have your 100% sympathy.

(Source: Shoujo Crusade)

1. Make Sweet
2. Sugar Baby Love
3. Meganegoshi no Kimi
4. Haru, Urara
5. Make Sweet Bangaihen: Aru Hi no Valentine
